show-glow.name: Show Object Glow
show-glow.description: Show the glow which surrounds certain objects in the editor.

invisible-block-style.name: Invisible Block Style
invisible-block-style.description:
Determines how invisible blocks are shown when not playtesting.
- Balanced: Minimum opacity of 30% and more visible at the edges of the screen
- In-Game: Same as in-game
- No Fade: Always fully visible

show-object-particles.name: Show Object Particles
show-object-particles.description: Show particles emitted from certain objects (e.g. orbs, pads, portals) in the editor.

audio-scale.name: Show Pulsing Objects
audio-scale.description: Pulses certain objects to the music.

show-circle-waves.name: Show Circle Waves
show-circle-waves.description: Show circle wave effects, such as the ones visible upon activating orbs, pads, and portals.

show-pulse-rod-balls.name: Show Pulsing Rod Orbs
show-pulse-rod-balls.description: Show the pulsing orbs that appear above pulsing rods (mostly seen in 1.0 levels) in the editor.

show-portal-backs.name: Show Portal Backsides
show-portal-backs.description: Show the backsides of portals in the editor.

show-colorblind-indicators.name: Show Colorblind Indicators
show-colorblind-indicators.description: Show orb/portal colorblind indicators in the editor.

show-fade-and-enter.name: Show Fade & Enter Effects
show-fade-and-enter.description: Show fade/enter effects in the editor.

show-glitter.name: Show Glitter
show-glitter.description: Show the glitter particles that appear in ship, UFO, wave, and swing gamemodes in the editor.

show-gravity-effect.name: Show Gravity Effect
show-gravity-effect.description: Show the blue/yellow lines that appear upon changing gravity in the editor.

show-mirror-effect.name: Show Mirror Effect
show-mirror-effect.description: Flip the level upon entering a mirror portal in the editor.

show-player-effects.name: Show Player Effects
show-player-effects.description: Show various player effects (e.g. particles, dash orb fire, trail, wave trail) in the editor.

activate-triggers.name: Activate All Triggers
activate-triggers.description: Activates shake, ghost effect, hide ground/middleground, etc. triggers which normally aren't activated in the editor.

hide-editor-trail.name: Hide Editor Trail
hide-editor-trail.description: Hides the editor trail while playtesting.

auto-hide-playtest-buttons.name: Hide Playtest UI
auto-hide-playtest-buttons.description: Hides the mouse cursor and playtest UI when not hovering over it during playtesting.

transparent-playtest-buttons.name: Low Opacity Playtest UI
transparent-playtest-buttons.description: Replaces the playtest button icons with transparent sprites during playtesting.

hide-triggers.name: Hide Triggers & Trigger Lines
hide-triggers.description: Hides triggers, keyframe lines, and camera guide lines while playtesting.

better-duration-lines.name: Better Duration Lines
better-duration-lines.description: Lowers the opacity of duration lines if they're on a different layer.

better-gradient-trigger.name: Better Gradient Trigger
better-gradient-trigger.description: Enhances the look of the gradient trigger icon.

better-particle-icons.name: Better Particle Icons
better-particle-icons.description: Lowers the opacity of 2.1 particle icons to match the look of 2.2 particle icons.

fix-object-rotation-drift.name: Fix Object Rotation Drift
fix-object-rotation-drift.description: Fixes objects with negative rotation drifting by 0.01 degrees upon saving and exiting.

fix-startpos-follow.name: Fix Follow Trigger Calculation
fix-startpos-follow.description: Fixes follow triggers being incorrectly calculated from start positions. This can result in objects being moved millions of blocks away from (0, 0), causing considerable lag on enter/exit as the game tries to allocate memory for what it thinks is a very long level.

fix-startpos-camera-shader.name: Fix Camera/Shader Trigger Calculation
fix-startpos-camera-shader.description: Fixes camera/shader triggers being incorrectly calculated from start positions, causing triggers which should've already ended to still play.

fix-detail-color-opacity.name: Fix Detail Color Opacity
fix-detail-color-opacity.description: Fixes the detail sprite of certain objects not decreasing opacity when on a different editor layer and preview mode is disabled.
